name: NIGHTMINE
description:
The year was 3103. 

Mankind was hit by a cosmic radiation blast which rendered all atomic engines useless. Taking humanity back almost a thousand years back to when electricity was its main power source.

Humans, known for their persistence, have somehow managed to prevail: They discovered a new type of mineral which seemed to have  huge amounts of energy stored in it.

Golathium.

The problem was, Golathium was only found on one extremely hostile planet, making its harvest terribly dangerous. But this was humanity's only shot at getting back to its former glory.

The federation quickly set up a dedicated force: the Razians.

A special breed of soldiers sent to this hell-like planet with only a Golathium weapon and a mineral drill, to fill the ultimate task-

Protect the drill, Mine Golathium, save humanity.

During the days, the planet seemed quiet Peaceful almost.

But at night, the monsters attack.

. . .
NIGHTMINE Made by Golan Amir, Ophir Benjamin and Raz Orenstein.

Sound - Our own vocals ! thanks to Ophir's Ableton skills

Hope you enjoy! that was our first game using Unity in a short scope of time.
